channel.title: Yakman's updater
channel.description:
this is an updater that i have been working on for a while now, i think it works quite well, hasnt broken in quite a while. i dont have that many stuff though, if it does everything correctly, it adds 42 methods.
dont commit it, cause its messy, just one class with loads of findXXX() methods, i guess ill just wait for someone else to commit a good structure, then add the stuff they dont have, like iv seen those with an abstract super class for everything they do.
i just added the thing which makes update.log, so it would work for cherokee, except i didnt rename any of the stuff in it, i think we should rename the ones already in cherokee,
like Monster, stuff like the Lumbridge Cook and Fred the Farmer come under this, but are they monsters? NPC fits much better, same with MonsterComposite, call it NPCDef or something Character interfears with java.lang.Character, lets use Entity or Denizen
those are the only ones that really annoy me, but it doesnt mean all are innocent *looks around accusingly* :P
also, updated your repository, cause i changed ClassEditor a bit
heres the update.log file, a bit mess cause of the order it adds it in [code] #470 #Format: methodName(S?static:field)=classToInsertInto-className.fieldName-typeIfNeeded com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Client=client getBytes()=sc-sc.e com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.StringWrapper=sc getLength()=sc-sc.F com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Node=ce getID()=ce-ce.b getNext()=ce-ce.i-Lcom/cherokee/rs/rs2/hooks/Node; getPrev()=ce-ce.e-Lcom/cherokee/rs/rs2/hooks/Node; com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.NodeSub=gd getNextSub()=gd-gd.O-Lcom/cherokee/rs/rs2/hooks/NodeSub; getPrevSub()=gd-gd.M-Lcom/cherokee/rs/rs2/hooks/NodeSub; com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Entity=ha getTextSpoken()=ha-ha.uc-Lcom/cherokee/rs/rs2/hooks/StringWrapper; getAnimation()=ha-ha.ac com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Animable=wc getModelHeight()=wc-wc.rb getName()=hd-hd.Yc-Lcom/cherokee/rs/rs2/hooks/StringWrapper; com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.NPC=hb com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Player=hd getNPCDef()=hb-hb.Vc-Lcom/cherokee/rs/rs2/hooks/NPCDef; com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.NPCDef=id getName()=id-id.db-Lcom/cherokee/rs/rs2/hooks/StringWrapper; getActions()=id-id.Jb-[Lcom/cherokee/rs/rs2/hooks/StringWrapper; getNPCID()=id-id.Ob getCombatLevel()=id-id.Lb getLoginIndex(S)=client-bf.T getBaseX(S)=client-j.d getLocationX()=ha-ha.Hb getBaseY(S)=client-jd.w getLocationY()=ha-ha.ic getHpMax()=ha-ha.mc getHpCurrent()=ha-ha.xb getLoopCycle(S)=client-e.j getLoopCycleStatus()=ha-ha.Yb getY()=ha-ha.gc getX()=ha-ha.Ub getCameraZ(S)=client-jc.a getCameraY(S)=client-a.tb getCameraX(S)=client-va.o getPlane(S)=client-e.i getByteGroundArray(S)=o-pf.N getIntGroundArray(S)=o-hf.l getMyPlayer(S)=client-ve.o-Lcom/cherokee/rs/rs2/hooks/Player; getSpeakingArray(S)=client-of.d-[Lcom/cherokee/rs/rs2/hooks/StringWrapper; getHeight()=ha-ha.Bb getPlayerArray(S)=client-pb.kb-[Lcom/cherokee/rs/rs2/hooks/Player; getPlayerValids(S)=client-jc.l getNPCArray(S)=client-nb.A-[Lcom/cherokee/rs/rs2/hooks/NPC; getNPCValids(S)=client-jf.i getPlayerCount(S)=client-tb.hb getNPCCount(S)=client-fe.l [/code]

item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

if you want structure, use my updater in the rs2 hacking sectionâ€¦

item.title: Yakman's updater
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

this is an updater that i have been working on for a while now, i think it works quite well, hasnt broken in quite a while.
i dont have that many stuff though, if it does everything correctly, it adds 42 methods.

dont commit it, cause its messy, just one class with loads of findXXX() methods, i guess ill just wait for someone else to commit a good structure, then add the stuff they dont have, like iv seen those with an abstract super class for everything they do.

i just added the thing which makes update.log, so it would work for cherokee, except i didnt rename any of the stuff in it, i think we should rename the ones already in cherokee,

like Monster, stuff like the Lumbridge Cook and Fred the Farmer come under this, but are they monsters? NPC fits much better, same with MonsterComposite, call it NPCDef or something
Character interfears with java.lang.Character, lets use Entity or Denizen

those are the only ones that really annoy me, but it doesnt mean all are innocent looks around accusingly

also, updated your repository, cause i changed ClassEditor a bit

heres the update.log file, a bit mess cause of the order it adds it in

#470
#Format: methodName(S?static:field)=classToInsertInto-className.fieldName-typeIfNeeded
com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.Client=client

getModelHeight()=wc-wc.rb

com.cherokee.rs.rs2.hooks.NPC=hb

getNPCDef()=hb-hb.Vc-Lcom/cherokee/rs/rs2/hooks/NPCDef;

getNPCID()=id-id.Ob
